R0025.title: Malicious User Poaching
R0025.description: Using comments, private messages, and other means to contact the platform's sponsors, customers, or streamers with the intent of redirecting them to other platforms.
R0025.influence: Disrupts normal platform operations, exposes users to fraud risks, and negatively impacts the company's normal operations.

references.title: Does a Live Streamer Maliciously Switching Platforms or Poaching During Contract Period Constitute Unfair Competition?
